AssistantChats.document: Enter the task details you want to assign. When you provide information about the task, a preview of the task that the recipient will see is displayed on the left. Review the preview and improve any lacking areas. Once the improvements are complete, use 'Assign Task' to give the task.

processExecution.title: Process Execution
processExecution.processDefinitionExplanation:
Execute the process interactively. For example, you can issue commands like: 
'I'd like to apply for a vacation:
 1. Reason: Personal matter
 2. Start date of leave: Today
 3. Return date from leave: Friday'
processExecution.agent: Use the Agent feature to draft your proposal.

adminDetail.rollbackMessage: Do you want to roll back to this point?

organizationChartDefinition.title: Org Chart Setup
organizationChartDefinition.organizationChartExplanation:
Manage the organization chart interactively.
You can register, modify, and delete teams (departments), roles, and employees.
For example, you can issue commands like: 'Register the development and management teams, and add Mr. Hong Gil-dong as a new employee to the management team. His role is a developer. The team leader of the management team is Team Leader Amuge.'
organizationChartDefinition.addNewUserExplanation: To add a new user, please enter their name and email address. An account will be automatically created using the provided email, and the initial password will be set to 000000.
organizationChartDefinition.deleteAgentExplanation: This is a permanent deletion. Deleted agents cannot be recovered. If you want to delete a team member, please use the + button in the team to modify the team member.

uiDefinition.title: Screen Definition
uiDefinition.uiDefinitionExplanation:
Manage screens interactively.
 For example, you can issue commands like 'I want to create a form to receive user information. The user information should include username, email, gender, and user profile image.'
uiDefinition.deleteFormMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the form?

processDefinition.title: Process Definition
processDefinition.processDefinitionExplanation:
Manage the process interactively. For example, you can issue commands like: 
'Register the sales management process as follows:
1. Register sales opportunities including customer name, estimated business size, key person, requirements
2. Proposal preparation: proposal contents, pricing
3. Winning or losing an order
4. If the order is won, proceed with contract execution'

processDefinition.deleteProcessMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this process?
processDefinition.restoreProcessMessage: Do you want to restore the process?

createAccount.title: Welcome to Process-GPT

tenantManagePage.title: Company Management
tenantManagePage.subTitle1: Create a new company or go to a page managed by the selected company.
tenantManagePage.subTitle2: (* Sign-up is not possible on mobile devices.)
tenantManagePage.subTitle3: Select a company to go to the page managed by the selected company.

tenantInfoField.step1-text:
(*The password must contain all of these : Uppercase and Lowercase letters, Number and Special characters.)
1. Go to the Supabase registration pageand create an account.
tenantInfoField.step2-1: STEP 2. Create a Project or Organization
tenantInfoField.step2-1-text:
1. Select “New Project” or “New Organization” from the page after creating an account.
2. Click “New Project”.
tenantInfoField.step2-2-text:
(*If you already have an organization, skip this step.)
1. Enter the name of the new organization you want to create in the “Name” field.
2. Click “Create organization” button.
tenantInfoField.step2-3-text:
1. Select “organization” and enter the name of the project you want to create in “Project name” field.
2. Enter the password of the database that you will use.
(*Paste the password you entered into the “Database Password” field below.
3. Select “Seoul” for the “Region” as the screenshot above.
4. Click “Create new project” button.
tenantInfoField.step3-1-text:
1. If the project creation is done, click the gear icon at the bottom left.
2. Select “API Menu” from the menu list of “Settings”.
3. (*Copy the URL from “Project URL” section and paste it into the box below.)
tenantInfoField.step3-2-text:
1. You can check the “Secret Key” by clicking the “Reveal” button from the “Project API Keys” section.
(*Copy the “Secret Key” and paste it into the box below.”
tenantInfoField.step3-3-text:
1. Select “Database” from the menu list of “Settings”.
2. Copy “Host”, “Database name”, “Port”, “User” from the “Connection parameters” section and paste it into the each box below.
tenantInfoField.step4: STEP 1. Enter the Company Name to Use
tenantInfoField.step4-text:
1. Enter the name of the company in the box below and click “Create” button to create a company.
The name of the company will be used as a sub-domain.
e.g. {Company Name}.process-gpt.io
tenantInfoField.step5: STEP 5. Setting up Supabase Site URL
tenantInfoField.step5-text:
1. Select lock icon(Authentication) from the left menu.
2. Click “URL Configuration”.
3. Click copy button to copy the “Site URL” including the company name you entered from Step4 and paste it into the “Site URL” box.
4. Click “Save” button.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.sendEmailExplanation: Please enter the email address associated with your account and We will email you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.passwordExplanation: Enter the password you want to reset.

BpmnPropertyPanel.name: Name
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionTitle: Data mapping is a function that passes variables to the next task
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Variables: Values added to the variable section 
2. Roles: Roles (names) registered in the swimlane 
3. Instance: Stores the end date of the next task to be executed 
4. Activities: Roles (names) registered in the task 
5. Arguments: Names (values) registered in the attributes
BpmnPropertyPanel.mapperDescriptionSubTitle2:
How to use 
- Drag and drop while holding the mouse to connect
- Click the line to delete

Mashup.hoverText: Drag a layout (Container) here to start editing the form.

ProcessDefinitionVersionDialog.title: Save Process
ProcessDefinitionVersionDialog.name: Name
ProcessDefinitionVersionDialog.versionDescriptionTitle: If checked, it will save by incrementing the version by one step, otherwise it will save in the current version.

ReceiveTaskPanel.skipIfNotFound: Skip if not found (404 error handling)
ReceiveTaskPanel.title: Title

ServiceTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to use when sending an API request and the server's endpoint URL to process the request.
ServiceTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. GET: A request to retrieve data from the server 
2. POST: A request to create and send new data to the server 
3. PUT: A request to update or replace existing data entirely 
4. PATCH: A request to partially modify existing data 
5. API URL: The endpoint URL of the server where the request will be sent

EventSynchronizationForm.name: Name
EventSynchronizationForm.typeDescriptionTitle: Attribute: Defines the data to be stored for the corresponding item
EventSynchronizationForm.typeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Unique Key: A key that uniquely identifies each record and does not allow duplicates within the database. 
2. Correlation Key: A key used to establish and track relationships between different data, maintaining data correlations.

UserTaskPanel.defaultInfo: All users assigned to this task role can view this task. The first user to select the task will be assigned as the assignee.
UserTaskPanel.sharedGroupInfo: All users in the selected shared group can view this task. The first user to select the task becomes the assignee. e.g., Author, Reviewer
UserTaskPanel.assigneeInfo: This task is assigned only to the specified user. Other users cannot view it.
UserTaskPanel.loadBalancingInfo: Tasks are automatically distributed among users in the designated group. You can select a distribution strategy.
UserTaskPanel.expressionInfo: The assignee is dynamically determined at runtime based on an expression. e.g., ${initiatorManager}
UserTaskPanel.formCreateDialog: Would you like to create a form?
UserTaskPanel.radioSelectDescriptionTitle: Select data processing method: basic data processing, custom screen creation, or external system integration.
UserTaskPanel.radioSelectDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. Basic: Use default data
2. Form: Use a screen created in the screen definition
3. External Application: Create a field to enter the business screen URL

SubProcessPanel.role: Create multiple sub-processes based on roles
SubProcessPanel.variable: Create multiple sub-processes based on variables
SubProcessPanel.forEachVariableDescriptionTitle: When multi-data is inserted by data mapping with the data registered in the process variables, multiple sub-processes are created based on the generated data during process execution.
SubProcessPanel.forEachVariableDescriptionSubTitle1: 1. Check multi-data mode through edit mode in screen definition management
SubProcessPanel.forEachVariableDescriptionSubTitle2: 2. Perform data mapping in the panel of the previous task to be executed
SubProcessPanel.forEachRoleDescriptionTitle: Create a Sub Process for every person with the selected role
SubProcessPanel.forEachRoleDescriptionSubTitle1:
Use Case: 
When multiple team members need to perform the same task, you can assign Sub Processes individually to each team member through role-based multi-instance generation. 
This allows each team member to work independently while the overall process is centrally managed. 

Below, the box in the image corresponds to the role field.

ParticipantPanel.systemDefinitionDescriptionTitle: Load and apply items registered in the system definition from the left-side management button
ParticipantPanel.apiUrlDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to be used when sending API requests and the endpoint URL of the server that will process the request.
ParticipantPanel.apiUrlDescriptionSubTitle1:
1.GET: A request to retrieve data from the server 
2.POST: A request to create and send new data to the server 
3.PUT: A request to update or replace the entire existing data 
4.PATCH: A request to partially modify existing data 
5.API URL: The endpoint address of the server where the request will be sent

LanePanel.radioDescriptionTitle: Select the role you want to add.
LanePanel.radioDescriptionSubTitle:
None: Selecting this option does not assign a specific role to the task. All users can perform this task.
Select by Role Name: Selecting this option allows you to choose from a predefined list of roles. Only users belonging to the selected role can perform this task.
Select Users Directly: Selecting this option allows you to designate specific users. Only designated users can perform this task.

MessageEventDefinitionPanel.return: Variable to store the return value
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.methodTypeDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to use for the API request and the endpoint URL of the server to handle the request
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.methodTypeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1. GET: Request to retrieve data from the server 
2. POST: Request to create and send new data to the server 
3. PUT: Request to update or replace existing data entirely 
4. PATCH: Request to partially modify existing data 
5. API URL: The endpoint address of the server to which the request will be sent
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.returnTitle:
The dropdown menu displays a list of variable names registered in the process variables. 
Select the variable to store the content written above.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.correlationKeyTitle: A correlation key is a unique value used to identify a specific message.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.correlationKeySubTitle:
When a Message Intermediate Catch Event receives a message, the correlation key is used to identify and process the correct message among many. This key is shared between the entity sending the message and the entity receiving it, allowing the message to be associated with a specific business process instance. 
For example, an order number or customer ID can be used as a correlation key.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.servicePathTitle: The service path represents the location or address of the service where the message will be delivered.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.servicePathSubTitle: It defines where the message should be sent within the service endpoint, and is used to enable communication between the process and other systems or services through message-based interactions. In BPMN, the service path is primarily configured to route messages or direct them to a specific service. Through the service path, the message is routed to the appropriate service.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.operationReferenceTitle: An operation reference is a reference that designates the operation to be performed to process a specific message.
MessageEventDefinitionPanel.operationReferenceSubTitle:
It defines the actions or business logic that should be executed when the message arrives. In BPMN, an operation reference helps clarify the content of the message and the task it triggers. 
For example, a specific operation reference may perform a database update or call an external service upon receiving the message.

SendTaskPanel.return: Variable to store the return value
SendTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionTitle: Set the method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH) to use when sending an API request and the server's endpoint URL to process the request.
SendTaskPanel.methodTypeDescriptionSubTitle1:
1.GET: A request to retrieve data from the server 
2.POST: A request to create and send new data to the server 
3.PUT: A request to update or replace existing data entirely 
4.PATCH: A request to partially modify existing data 
5.API URL: The endpoint URL of the server where the request will be sent
SendTaskPanel.returnTitle:
The dropdown menu displays a list of variable names registered in the process variables. 
Users can select the desired variable from this list.

ScriptTaskPanel.return: Variable to store the return value
ScriptTaskPanel.scriptDescriptionTitle: Script Task enables the execution of micro-level configurations or actions that are difficult to handle solely through process configuration by directly setting activities using JavaScript or Java.
ScriptTaskPanel.returnTitle:
The dropdown menu displays a list of variable names registered in the process variables. 
Users can select the desired variable from this list.

TimerEventDefinitionPanel.cronDescriptionTitle: You can use a Cron expression to precisely set the time at which the Timer Intermediate Catch Event will be triggered.
TimerEventDefinitionPanel.cronDescriptionSubTitle:
Format: A Cron expression consists of five fields, each representing minutes, hours, day of the month, month, and day of the week. 
Examples: 
0 0 * * * : Triggers the event every day at midnight (00:00). 
15 10 * * * : Triggers the event every day at 10:15 AM. 
0 9 1 * * : Triggers the event on the 1st of every month at 9:00 AM. 
0 0 * * 1 : Triggers the event every Monday at midnight (00:00). 
*/10 * * * * : Triggers the event every 10 minutes.

GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionTitle: Used when selecting to proceed to the next task through Gateway condition processing.
GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionSubTitle: Exclusive Gateway: When exiting, it moves to one task that matches the condition applied to the line. When entering, it proceeds to the next task if any of the multiple tasks are completed, and the existing task is terminated.
GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionSubTitle1: Parallel Gateway: When exiting, it proceeds to all subsequent tasks in parallel if the condition applied to the line is met. When entering, it proceeds to the next task only when all tasks are completed.
GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionSubTitle2: Inclusive Gateway: When exiting, it moves to one task that matches the condition applied to the line. When entering, it proceeds to the next task only when all tasks are completed.
GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionSubTitle3: Event-based gateway: It can only proceed to the next task when a specific event occurs.
GatewayPanel.gatewayDescriptionSubTitle4: Complex Gateway (Not Implemented): Users can add arbitrary conditions to select the next task.

BSCard.title: Strategy Map
BSCard.description: Organize and visualize your organization's strategic goals from four perspectives: Finance, Customer, Internal Process, and Learning & Growth.

IntroSection.title: Introduction to Process GPT
IntroSection.subtitle: Easily design and manage business processes through natural language-based AI chat
IntroSection.description: Process GPT leverages the capabilities of Generative AI (LLM) to define business processes in natural language and convert them into executable models. This simplifies traditional BPM work and reduces costs and effort, seamlessly integrating LangChain and Chat-GPT models for execution and definition.
IntroSection.card1Description: Automatically generates business processes by analyzing user input through AI chat.
IntroSection.card2Description: Recommends optimal processes tailored to user requirements and suggests improvement strategies.
IntroSection.card3Description: Improves process management efficiency and strengthens collaboration between teams.

HeroSection.title: Easily start from AI-based process management to execution
HeroSection.description: Define business processes in natural language with Process GPT and convert them into executable models. Simplify traditional BPM work and reduce costs and effort.

DemoSection.title: AI-based Business Process Innovation
DemoSection.description1: Process GPT is an innovative open-source system based on BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation). It implements a user-centric AI agent system utilizing business process notation accumulated over about 20 years. You can define, automate, and continuously improve complex business processes in natural language.
DemoSection.description2: Unlike traditional BPM systems, Process GPT leverages the power of AI to simplify all stages from business process definition to execution and optimization. This enables companies to achieve more efficient and flexible process management while saving time and resources.

ConsultingSection.title: Process Consulting AI and Management
ConsultingSection.subtitle: Innovate your business processes with AI-based process consulting
ConsultingSection.tab1Description: Users can generate the necessary business process definitions through consulting AI chat. Enter the desired business process content through the chat window, and if there are areas you want to improve or add, input more detailed information.
ConsultingSection.tab2Description: AI analyzes user input through chat and automatically generates business process definitions as BPMN diagrams. Forms required for each step can be generated, and processes can be created by distinguishing between user tasks and script tasks.
ConsultingSection.tab3Description: Organization charts can be generated through chat and confirmed and directly managed through organization chart charts. Organization charts allow registration, modification, and deletion of teams (departments), roles, and employees.

FeaturesSection.title: Process GPT Key Features
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Innovate process management with powerful features
FeaturesSection.tab1Description: While chatting with other users, you can receive task recommendations through AI and execute related process instances. Through AI voice chat, users can check various Q&A about defined processes.
FeaturesSection.tab1Item1: General chat and AI voice chat support
FeaturesSection.tab2Description: Users can execute defined process instances. Work items of instances can be performed through form input or script execution.
FeaturesSection.tab2Item2: Perform work items through form input
FeaturesSection.tab3Description: Users can check the task list, add tasks, and change task status. Provides an intuitive interface for efficient task management.

SpecialSection.processGptMainTitle: Process GPT - My Friend, My AI Agent
SpecialSection.autoTeamProcessTitle: Automated Human-Agent Team Process Definition for Achieving Organizational Goals
SpecialSection.coreDistinctionDescription: Unlike existing AI agent systems, Process GPT provides an innovative approach that automatically identifies and implements business processes. Users can define and execute complex business processes through natural language conversation alone without coding knowledge.
SpecialSection.feature1Description: General users can provide feedback on process flow appropriateness without programming concepts, and AI internally defines BPMN-based processes.
SpecialSection.feature2Description: When business process instances occur, processes are automatically improved through user feedback, enabling continuous development.
SpecialSection.feature3Description: Derives business processes through conversation with users, collects feedback through automatic tours, and establishes processes.
SpecialSection.feature4Description: Automatically identifies agents needed for processes, maps them to BPMN SwimLanes (work roles), and automatically generates prompts.
SpecialSection.feature5Description: Implements industry-standard compliant processes utilizing business process notation accumulated over about 20 years.
SpecialSection.tabDescription1: Process definition generation and visualization through generative AI are possible. After generation, administrators can make detailed modifications, and detailed modifications can also be described in natural language.
SpecialSection.tabDescription2: Based on AI, work screens optimized for multi-screen based on the latest frameworks can be instantly generated, and generated screens can be modified as desired.
SpecialSection.tabDescription3: Based on AI, it interprets Open API Specs of internal systems and automatically generates how to integrate with process data values.

CasesSection.title: Successful Implementation Cases
CasesSection.kBankDescription: Introduced a bank-wide BPM system to integrate ledgers and operations from the AS-IS system structure where account systems and BPR ledgers were dualized.
CasesSection.kBankAchievement1: Implementation of process management-centered system architecture
CasesSection.hLifeDescription: Introduced a BPM system to efficiently manage complex and difficult processes.
CasesSection.hLifeAchievement1: Built work environment through integrated single worklist
CasesSection.hLifeAchievement2: Accommodated complex processes such as irregular, dynamic parallel branching, event branching
CasesSection.hLifeAchievement3: Proved flexibility and scalability over foreign vendors
CasesSection.sElectronicsTitle: S Electronics - Next-Generation Anomaly Processing System
CasesSection.sElectronicsDescription: Built an efficient process management system that can capitalize and automate process management anomaly occurrence processes.
CasesSection.sElectronicsAchievement1: Secured efficiency in anomaly occurrence processing through BPM introduction
CasesSection.sElectronicsAchievement2: Automation and process capitalization for highly variable processes
CasesSection.sElectronicsAchievement3: Secured speed and efficiency in collaborative processing among system constituents

TechSection.title: Technology Stack
TechSection.modelDescription: Chat-GPT4 (for process execution), Chat-GPT3.5 (for definition generation and agent execution)

ExtensibilitySection.title: External System Integration and Extensibility
ExtensibilitySection.exportFormatsDescription: AI agents developed in Process GPT can be exported in LangGraph and Crew AI formats, providing compatibility with existing agent systems.
ExtensibilitySection.a2aProtocolDescription: Supports Agent to Agent communication protocol proposed by Google, enabling smooth integration with various systems and standardized communication.

DownloadSection.title: Mobile App Download
DownloadSection.subtitle: Use Process GPT on mobile anytime, anywhere
DownloadSection.description: With the Process GPT mobile app, you can manage and monitor business processes on the go. Stay updated with important updates through real-time notifications and maintain smooth communication with team members.
DownloadSection.downloadError: An error occurred during download. Please try again later.

CTASection.title: Start Process GPT Right Now
CTASection.subtitle: Experience the innovation of AI-based process management
